mdRecord.dcterms:title: Notice of the sale of the Clifton Land [River Farm] to [George] Washington, 1760 May 20
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Notice of sale of the Clifton Land to Geoge Washington. Signed by the Commissioners, G[eorge] W[illiam] Fairfax, G[eorge] Washington and Ch[arles] Green. On reverse is copy of a statement by Wm. Digges dated June 17, 1760, to effect that Ignatius Digges & Charles Carroll have seen the notice but refuse to comply. Docketed on reverse by George Washington in a later hand writing. Document laminated, watermark (GR surmounted by crown).
